description: Korean fried rice gets a makeover with cauliflower without sacrificing any flavour.
name: Korean Fried Cauliflower Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 spring onions, sliced, green tops reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cauliflower in a food processor and pulse until it resembles rice.
Heat the half of the oil in a wok on high heat and stir fry the cauliflower rice for 7-8 minutes until lightly browned. Add the mixed vegetables and spring onion and cook for 3 minutes.
Whisk the gochujang paste, soy sauce, garlic and ginger together and tip into the wok. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring well to coat all the rice and vegetables.
Heat the remaining oil in a separate pan and fry the eggs until just cooked, with the yolks still runny.
Divide the rice between 4 bowls, top each with a fried egg and chopped spring onion tops. Serve with sriracha and lime wedges, if desired.
